description: This file defines a CartProvider class for managing shopping cart items in a Flutter app, including methods to add, remove, and modify items, and it extends ChangeNotifier to notify listeners of changes.

classes.name: CartProvider
classes.description: A provider class that manages a list of CartItem objects, providing methods for adding, removing, and updating items, and notifying listeners on state changes.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a MenuItem to the cart, increasing quantity if already present.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a MenuItem from the cart.

methods.name: increaseQuantity
methods.description: Increases the quantity of a specified MenuItem in the cart.

methods.name: decreaseQuantity
methods.description: Decreases the quantity of a specified MenuItem and removes it if quantity reaches zero.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears all items from the cart.
